title: H&R Block Tax Software Basic 2024 with Refund Bonus Offer (Amazon Exclusive) Win/Mac [PC/Mac Online Code]
description: H&R Block Basic Tax Software offers everything simple for first-time tax filers need to complete federal taxes and get their maximum refund gauranteed. It includes step-by-step guidance on more than 350 credits and deductions, a help center with over 13,000 searchable articles, and in-person representation in the unlikely event of an audit.
